column3: Latest;Kampot:------  A man was stabbed to death by  fellow workers in Monivong Bokor National Park.------The incident occurred on the night of January 18
column4: 2020 at 20:40 in the restaurant at the Waterfall in Monivong Bokor National Park in Rolous village
column7: Kampot province.------A group of suspects were drinking and arguing until they stabbed the victim
column9: a 31-year-old man from Neang Kong Kung village
column11: Kampong Cham province. The victim died on the way to hospital. Authorities have detained seven suspects and law enforcement are questioning and taking action. ------AREY
